quote: Book is book.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Read books
author: Deliaha Hicks

quote: Write the book you want to read
author: Austin Kleon

quote: We live for books.
author: Umberto Eco

quote: Books are for people who wish they were somewhere else.
author: Mark Twain

quote: A book is really like a lover. It arranges itself in your life in a way that is beautiful.
author: Maurice Sendak

quote: A book is a device to ignite the imagination.
author: Alan Bennett,  The Uncommon Reader

quote: A good book is an event in my life.
author: Stendhal,  The Red and the Black

quote: The best books... are those that tell you what you know already.
author: George Orwell,  1984

quote: Books, the children of the brain.
author: Jonathan Swift,  A Tale Of A Tub And Other Writings

quote: Good books are about everything.
author: Andrew Smith,  Grasshopper Jungle

quote: A book comes and says, 'Write me.
author: Madeleine L'Engle

quote: Old books that we have known but not possessed cross our path and invite themselves over. New books try to seduce us daily with tempting titles and tantalizing covers.
author: Alberto Manguel,  The Library at Night

quote: A book is as private and consensual as sex.
author: Chuck Palahniuk,  Haunted

quote: A book with the genuine power to stir and comfort its readers.
author: Mitch Albom

quote: I wanted to live among books.
author: Alberto Manguel,  A History of Reading

quote: A great book is a homing deviceFor navigating paradise.A good book somehow makes you careAbout the comfort of a chair.A bad book owes to many treesA forest of apologies.
author: J. Patrick Lewis

quote: I believe in books.
author: Carole Maso,  Room Lit By Roses

quote: I read the fuck out of every book I can get my hands on.
author: Nick Hornby,  A Long Way Down

quote: It is books that are a key to the wide world; if you can't do anything else, read all that you can.
author: Jane Hamilton

quote: A good book ... leaves you wanting to reread the book. A great book compels you to reread your own soul.
author: Richard Flanagan,  The Narrow Road to the Deep North

quote: A book is a version of the world. If you do not like it, ignore it; or offer your own version in return.
author: Salman Rushdie

quote: I have never been able to resist a book about books.
author: Anne Fadiman,  Ex Libris: Confessions of a Common Reader

quote: If you love books enough, books will love you back.
author: Jo Walton,  Among Others

quote: The book is a film that takes place in the mind of the reader. That's why we go to movies and say, "Oh, the book is better.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: Books have a way of finding their way into our lives, usually, right when we need them the most.
author: Richard P. Denney

quote: Books are for nothing but to inspire
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: great books are the ones we need
author: Charles Bukowski,  The Last Night of the Earth Poems

quote: They had only ever discussed books but what, in this life, is more personal than books?
author: Gabrielle Zevin,  The Storied Life of A.J. Fikry

quote: Books are the treasured wealth of the world and the fit inheritance of generations and nations.
author: Henry David Thoreau,  Walden

quote: I plan to learn enough to read you like a book.
author: Sylvia Brownrigg,  Pages for You

quote: If you don’t like to read, you haven’t found the right book.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: We need the books that affect us like a disaster, that grieve us deeply, like the death of someone we loved more than ourselves, like being banished into forests far from everyone, like a suicide. A book must be the axe for the frozen sea inside us.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: The world exists to end up in a book.
author: Stéphane Mallarmé

quote: The problem with books is that they end.
author: Caroline Kepnes,  You

quote: What are a friend's books for if not to be borrowed?
author: Tom Stoppard,  Arcadia

quote: Books are like friends to me. Words come alive on the page.
author: Beverly Lewis

quote: The function of a book is to provide a reading experience.
author: Douglas Rushkoff

quote: A book is more than the sum of its materials. It is an artifact of the human mind and hand.
author: Geraldine Brooks,  People of the Book

quote: Life is a book and there are a thousand pages I have not yet read.
author: Cassandra Clare,  Clockwork Princess

quote: I cannot live without books.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Books wrote our life story, and as they accumulated on our shelves (and on our windowsills, and underneath our sofa, and on top of our refrigerator), they became chapters in it themselves.
author: Anne Fadiman,  Ex Libris: Confessions of a Common Reader

quote: The wonderful thing about books is that they allow us to enter imaginatively into someone else’s life. And when we do that, we learn to sympathize with other people. But the real surprise is that we also learn truths about ourselves, about our own lives, that somehow we hadn’t been able to see before.
author: Katherine Paterson

quote: The Book of Life, I’m still writing it—both literally and literarily. So far I’ve written the Table of Contents. Right now it’s more of a coffee table.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: A book is more than a verbal structure or series of verbal structures; it is the dialogue it establishes with its reader and the intonation it imposes upon his voice and the changing and durable images it leaves in his memory. A book is not an isolated being: it is a relationship, an axis of innumerable relationships.
author: Jorge Luis Borges

quote: Books are my friends, my companions. They make me laugh and cry and find meaning in life.
author: Christopher Paolini,  Eragon

quote: Books are the carriers of civilization...They are companions, teachers, magicians, bankers of the treasures of the mind. Books are humanity in print.
author: Barbara W. Tuchman

quote: The sole/soul purpose of a book is to be read.
author: Dani J. Caile

quote: Never write a book and let it sit on a shelf
author: Marvela Dawnay

quote: Books are the mirrors of the soul.
author: Virginia Woolf,  Between the Acts
